author: Sam Ross
description: Sam describes his drink as "a summertime Manhattan. Light and floral, as opposed to the heavy style of the classic Manhattan."
name: Cobble Hill
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of stirring glass
Add other ingredients, STIR with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
